channel.title: Disable clickable links in a single page on Squarespace
channel.description:
[quote] Dear Caue,
Currently building a site (offline) on squarespace, and have a question that you seemed to have answered for others:
How to disable clickable links (on both images and captions) inside a Summary Gallery.
I would like to do this on only one single page of the site, and of course do not want to disturb the rest. Could I ask you for your advice?
Richard Beaudoin
- [/quote]

item.title: Disable clickable links in a single page on Squarespace
item.dc:creator: @cregox Caue Rego
item.description:
@cregox wrote:

I suppose you're talking about that or this:

Remove any image click / link / lightbox from gallery page closing

From there, to limit it to a single page you could simply apply the code inside that page, rather than globally. Two ways of doing it, using a Code Block or Code Injection per Page, then just wrap the CSS code into HTML tags:

<style>
  your-css-goes-here
</style>

Now, I'm no longer working with any kind of support, so I won't be able to help you further.
